name: Manifest (Demo)
description:
In the underground, monsters are everywhere. And you're about to be one of them! After you manifest with a strange ring on your finger and the information that a curse is corrupting the inhabitants of the underground, you must set off on a journey to find the source of the curse and destroy it.

Because you're the only one that can.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Manifest is a 2D top-down action RPG that takes place in an underground world inhabited by monsters. 

Before embarking on your journey you have the option to play as the brave Shade,

 

The valiant Gremlin Orc,

Or the powerful Wizikin.

What you choose will affect your adventure greatly...

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

FEATURES:

  • 3 Classes to choose from.
  • Traditional top down RPG combat with a twist.
  • A story driven by its quirky cast.
  • No grinding! Character progression is tied to how many hearts you have.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

CONTROLS:

Manifest can be played with either a controller or keyboard. Controller is recommended.

Controller Controls (Xbox)

  • DPAD - Movement
  • A - Interact
  • B - Back
  • X- Attack
  • Y (Tap) - Quick Ability
  • Y (Hold) - Charged Ability
  • LB - Quick Use Item 1
  • RB - Quick Use Item 2
  • Start - Pause Game
  • Select - Open Menu

Keyboard Controls

  • Arrow Keys - Movement
  • Z- Interact
  • X - Back
  • A- Attack
  • S (Tap) - Quick Ability
  • S (Hold) - Charged Ability
  • Q - Quick Use Item 1
  • W - Quick Use Item 2
  • Escape - Pause Game
  • C - Open Menu

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

KNOWN BUGS:

  • Sometimes the player character freezes after an attack animation. If this happens pause and un-pause the game (Escape on Keyboard, Start on Controller), or get hit by an enemy.
